description: Transformers for Apalache counterexamples (CEs) from Tendermint LightClient model

input.name: last_lightstore
input.description: extract the lightstore from the last state of Apalache CE

input.name: lightblock_commits
input.description: extract validators from a block of Apalache CE

input.name: block_next_validators
input.description: extract next validators from a block of Apalache CE

input.name: block_height
input.description: extract height from a block of Apalache CE

input.name: id_to_validator
input.description: transform an identifier into a validator expected by `tendermint-tendermint validator`

input.name: block_to_header
input.description: transform a block from Apalache CE into a header expected by `tendermint-tendermint header`

input.name: block_to_commit
input.description: transform a block from Apalache CE into a commit expected by `tendermint-tendermint commit`

input.name: ids_to_validator_set
input.description: transform an array of identifiers into a a JSON-encoded Tendermint validator set

input.name: block_to_signed_header
input.description: transform a block from Apalache CE into a JSON-encoded Tendermint signed header
